transportAdvice: Shenzhen has an extensive and modern metro system that connects most major districts and tourist areas, making it the most practical way to get around. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available, though walking is only practical within individual districts due to the city's sprawling layout.

weather.description: Cool and mostly dry with occasional overcast skies, the mildest and most comfortable time of year for sightseeing.
Still cool and relatively dry, though light rain and mist become more frequent as the month progresses.
Temperatures rise and humidity increases noticeably, with more frequent drizzle and overcast conditions.
Warm and increasingly wet, with regular showers and muggy conditions signaling the approach of the rainy season.
Hot and very humid with frequent heavy downpours, marking the start of the wet season.
Peak rainy season with intense tropical downpours and high heat; typhoon risk begins this month.
The hottest and one of the wettest months, with significant typhoon risk and oppressive humidity.
Continues hot and stormy with the highest typhoon activity of the year; outdoor plans should remain flexible.
Still warm and rainy with lingering typhoon risk, though conditions begin to ease toward month's end.
Noticeably more pleasant as rain decreases and temperatures cool, making this one of the best months to visit.
Dry, sunny, and comfortably warm â€” excellent conditions for exploring the city outdoors.
Cool and dry with clear skies, offering comfortable sightseeing weather and a festive urban atmosphere.
